column3: Are you guys ready to play the game?
So, today, we will be playing a matching game.
Have you ever played a matching game before?
Well, I'll let you know how it works.
Smurfy really wants to play the game today, okay?
So, in front of your screens, you will see two pictures.
But only one of you friends will see a picture in a black box, okay?
So, if you have Smurfy, [id52], you will be guessing the picture in the black box.
And [id51], if you don't have Smurfy, you will be telling [id52] what you see in the black box, okay?
To make a guess, we will just tap on the screen once, but not yet.
We'll just tap on the screen once, and he will see a picture.
If you see a smiley face...
You guys will take turns, yeah.
If you see a smiley face, great.
If you see a sad face, it wasn't a match, but you guys can always try again next time.
Does that make sense? Yeah, okay.
So, do you have any questions, my friends?
Okay, should we start the game?
Okay, let's press on the blue button.
So now, [id51] will be the first one to guess.
So [id52], what does that look like to you in the black box?
Yeah, so that she can guess.
Should I say it's a banana?
We want to help her if she gets.
So what does that look like?
Yeah, we want to help, right?
Which one looks like a banana?
So now, we'll pass you on.
What does that look like to you?
Is it too easy for you?
What does it kind of look like?
It kind of looks like a bear.
It kind of looks like a bear.
[id51], which one looks like a bear?
[id52], we have to listen before we make a choice, okay?
So let's give it to [id51] again.
Which one looks like a person?
Now you will be guessing, okay?
[id51], what does that look like to you?
Which one looks like a sloth?
What does that look like to you?
What does it kind of look like?
It kind of looks like someone...
It looks like someone's like walking while sliding?
Okay, so it looks like someone who's like walking while sliding.
It's not the one in the box.
[id51], what does that look like to you?
Which one looks like a spider to you?
Which one looks like a spider?
[id52], what does that look like to you?
We have to describe it when we see the box, okay?
What does that look like to you?
A person. Do you see a person, [id51]?
Yeah, what does that look like to you in the box?
It changes to the same one.
Someone has three hands with a diamond head.
Two hands with a diamond head.
Someone has two hands and a diamond head.
It wasn't a match, but that's okay.
We can try again next time, okay?
We can try to make Smurfy guess next time.
What does that look like to you?
Which one looks like a spider?
[id52], what do you see in the box?
Let's tell [id51] what we see in the box, okay?
A gem with a triangle head.
A gem with a triangle head?
A gem with a triangle head and zero feet.
I tried to describe this one.
Now what does that look like to you, [id51]?
Do I need the wrong one?
No, let's not do the wrong one.
Oh, my friends, the game is over.
Thank you guys so much for playing my game, okay?
I will turn the camera off.
Do you guys want to wave bye-bye?
